DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether addition Elotuzumab Lenalidomide/low-dose Dexamethasone increase progression free survival ( PFS )
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Study Lenalidomide Dexamethasone With Without Elotuzumab Treat Newly Diagnosed , Previously Untreated Multiple Myeloma
